trends: There have been 24 other sightings in North Myrtle Beach
There were no other sightings in North Myrtle Beach on or around June 27th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile sitting at the beach at night, we witnessed three red orange lights in a triangle formation above the ocean. They made no noise and hovered. After a few seconds, they disappeared. It was over the Atlantic Ocean and appeared to be nothing manmade.
Summary: Three red orange lights in triangle formation.
